amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $1 dollar spending cap in the bill for National Park Service spending for activities in the Mojave National Preserve, eliminate the $600,000 appropriation for the BLM to run the preserve, and transfer those funds to the National Park Service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 19 in the Congressional Record of July 11, to strike the $1 dollar spending cap in the bill for National Park Service spending for activities in the Mojave National Preserve, eliminate the $600,000 appropriation for the BLM to run the park, and transfer those monies to the National Park Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fazio amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 227 (Roll no. 509).
